医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示CNTN4基因在神经元发育和阿尔茨海默病发病机制中的作用新研究揭示了细胞蛋白质之间复杂的相互作用，以及它们如何影响神经发育障碍和阿尔茨海默病中的神经元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-CNTN4-genes-role-in-neuronal-development-and-Alzheimers-disease-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-CNTN4-genes-role-in-neuronal-development-and-Alzheimers-disease-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83e2aec4-e12f-4d94-a70e-bac99664a803 Wed, 15 May 2024 16:00:45 -0400 Study reveals CNTN4 gene's role in neuronal development and Alzheimer's disease pathogenesis
关于运动如何帮助预防或减缓衰老过程中认知能力下降的新见解发表在《衰老细胞》上的新研究提供了关于运动如何有助于预防或减缓衰老过程中认知能力下降的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-insights-into-how-exercise-may-help-prevent-or-slow-cognitive-decline-during-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-insights-into-how-exercise-may-help-prevent-or-slow-cognitive-decline-during-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d13bf7e7-f5bf-4367-914f-ac8959a91aab Wed, 15 May 2024 15:53:53 -0400 New insights into how exercise may help prevent or slow cognitive decline during aging
探索中年已婚夫妇的正念、自我慈悲和关系满意度之间的联系许多人在日常生活中练习正念或自我同情技巧，作为正常自我护理的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Exploring-the-link- Between-mindativity-self-compassion-and-relationship-satisfaction-in-midlife-married- Couples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Exploring-the-link- Between-mindativity-self-compassion-and-relationship-satisfaction-in-midlife-married- Couples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=616aa27d-76fd-4ae5-8cdf-1aefdbadf08d Wed, 15 May 2024 15:49:28 -0400 Exploring the link between mindfulness, self-compassion, and relationship satisfaction in midlife married couples
RoboCA3T：一种新型机器人启发的计算机辅助自适应自闭症治疗发表在《计算机辅助学习杂志》上的一项新研究介绍了一种新颖的机器人启发计算机辅助自适应自闭症疗法（RoboCA3T），该疗法利用了患有自闭症谱系障碍的儿童对技术和机器人的自然亲和力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/RoboCA3T-A-novel-robot-inspired-computer-operative-adaptive-autism-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/RoboCA3T-A-novel-robot-inspired-computer-assis-adaptive-autism-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f6c7e8c-6825-4515-bf7c-ec2bfd46b460 Wed, 15 May 2024 15:44:01 -0400 RoboCA3T: A novel robot-inspired computer-assisted adaptive autism therapy
了解老年人社区流动性与认知功能之间的关系根据发表在《美国老年医学会杂志》上的新研究，个人在社区内的流动程度——他们外出活动的次数——可能与他们的认知功能有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Understanding-the-relationship- Between-community-mobility-and-cognitive-function-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Understanding-the-relationship- Between-community-mobility-and-cognitive-function-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c618af8-f4cb-425a-bd7b-d974d9f32a16 Wed, 15 May 2024 15:38:00 -0400 Understanding the relationship between community mobility and cognitive function in older adults
通过放射组学预测半月板撕裂风险新的研究表明，通过成像测试评估的各种特征可以揭示一个人发生半月板撕裂的风险，这是最常见的膝关节损伤之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Predicting-meniscus-tear-risk-with-radiomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Predicting-meniscus-tear-risk-with-radiomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84868a5e-1b59-420a-94c4-469f826ae487 Wed, 15 May 2024 15:24:57 -0400 Predicting meniscus tear risk with radiomics
手术团队的性别多样性与患者更好的术后结果相关牛津大学出版社发表在《英国外科杂志》上的一篇新论文发现，手术团队性别多样性较高的医院提供的护理与患者更好的术后结果相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Gender-diversity-in-surgery-teams-linked-to-better-post-operative-outcomes-for-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Gender-diversity-in-surgery-teams-linked-to-better-post-operative-outcomes-for-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48f0836e-966e-4a4b-bf7d-393e442818eb Wed, 15 May 2024 15:19:07 -0400 Gender diversity in surgery teams linked to better post-operative outcomes for patients
翻译服务与外国出生的心脏病发作后患者参加心脏学校相关心脏病发作后，与本土出生的患者相比，外国出生的患者参加预防复发心脏病学校的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Interpreter-access-linked-with-Heart-School-participation-among-foreign-born-post-heart-attack-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Interpreter-access-linked-with-Heart-School-participation-among-foreign-born-post-heart-attack-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9e3c965-2588-4307-8b51-03d43c3ab5e3 Wed, 15 May 2024 15:14:31 -0400 Interpreter access associated with Heart School participation among foreign-born post-heart attack patients
RPGRIP1L 基因表达水平可以成为浸润性乳腺癌的潜在预后标志物一种名为视网膜色素变性 GTP 酶调节相互作用蛋白 1 样 (RPGRIP1L) 的蛋白质执行对发育和一生健康都很重要的各种功能，RPGRIP1L 基因的突变与不同的疾病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/RPGRIP1L-gene-express-levels-can-be-a-potential-prognostic-marker-for- Invasive-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/RPGRIP1L-gene-express-levels-can-be-a-potential-prognostic-marker-for- Invasive-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d277c01-1f5e-4de1-a782-a2a2fb1bd54f Wed, 15 May 2024 15:06:30 -0400 RPGRIP1L gene expression levels can be a potential prognostic marker for invasive breast cancer
研究揭示核糖体 DNA 拷贝数与疾病风险之间的关联核糖体 DNA (rDNA) 在基因组中存在数百个拷贝，但之前并未成为遗传分析的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-association- Between-ribosomal-DNA-copy-number-and-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-association- Between-ribosomal-DNA-copy-number-and-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59f723f6-9171-4ba6-92b7-85f70f4c5993 Wed, 15 May 2024 14:58:59 -0400 Study reveals association between ribosomal DNA copy number and disease risk
